title: I Do Not Want to Inherit the Family Fortune - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Psychological   Romance   Slice of Life

description: “No, if you don’t work hard, you will have to go back and inherit trillions of possessions.” Chen Ping, as the heir to the top giants, was very troubled.>
